      • mapHostToCluster

        public void mapHostToCluster(String hostname,
                             String clusterName)
                      throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Attempts to map the host to the cluster via clusterhostmapping table if not already present, and add a host_version record for the cluster's currently applied (stack, version) if not already present.
        Specified by:
        mapHostToCluster in interface Clusters
        Parameters:
        hostname - Host name
        clusterName - Cluster name
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException - May throw a DuplicateResourceException.

                throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException

        Throws:
